name: Cle de Peau Beaute x VOGUE Hong Kong x KRISTA KIM

metadata.name: Clé de Peau Beauté x Vogue Hong Kong x Krista Kim
metadata.description: Clé de Peau Beauté and Vogue Hong Kong believe that creativity can bring about real change in the world and have always celebrated and supported female talents across different creative fields. To commemorate Clé de Peau Beauté’s 40th anniversary, Vogue Hong Kong has provided a platform for Krista Kim and Clé de Peau Beauté to join forces in creating a one-of-a-kind milestone project.  This trailblazing collaboration between Krista Kim, Vogue Hong Kong and Clé de Peau Beauté forges a bright new horizon in art — one that allows us to unlock and empower women and bask in the power of radiance.
